item.title: Using Windows Disposable VMs for test and research
item.description: Introduction To continue the idea of my previous posts, I want to share a project I have been improving in the last months; I can't imagine the number of times I had to deploy a Windows VM while testing or researching. And something I identified as challenges when doing that are: Baseline configuration Portability between private and public clouds. Licensing Baseline Configuration And this is the initial state I would like to have for a fresh VM instance of Windows, no matter the version or edition.
